title: How to Upload a PDF or Document to Google Docs

steps.title: Go to https://docs.google.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://docs.google.com in a web browser. If you’re not already signed in to your Google account, sign in now.

steps.title: Click +.
steps.content: Click + . It’s in the white rectangle near the top-left corner of the page.

steps.title: Click the File menu.
steps.content: Click the File menu. It’s near the top-left corner of the page.

steps.title: Click the Upload tab.
steps.content: Click the Upload tab. It’s the last tab at the top of the window.

steps.title: Click Select a file from your computer.
steps.content: Click Select a file from your computer . It’s the blue button at the center of the screen. You can also drag the document from your computer the area surrounded by a blue dashed line.

steps.title: Open the folder where the document is saved.
steps.content: Open the folder where the document is saved.

steps.title: Select the document and click Open.
steps.content: Select the document and click Open . This uploads the document and converts it to a Google Docs file. The document will also save to your Google Drive.
